data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Jing, Zhang, Bin, Zhu, Xichao, Jiang, Liyun, Qiao, Gexia (2015): Review of the aphid genus Aspidophorodon Verma, 1967 with descriptions of three new species from China (Hemiptera: Aphididae: Aphidinae). Zootaxa 4028 (4): 551-576, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4028.4.6
